job_tasks.phrase: Machine learning-modellen en NLP-technologieën integreren in onze bestaande en nieuwe oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions integrating machine learning models and NLP technologies, which falls under the core of creating and adapting AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: AI-agents ontwerpen en bouwen die bedrijven ondersteunen in hun dagelijkse processen.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and building AI agents that support daily business processes implies creating functional software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: integreren in onze bestaande en nieuwe oplossingen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the development and integration of AI capabilities into broader software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Experimenteren met cutting-edge technologieën zoals GPT-modellen
job_tasks.justification: Experimenting with GPT models directly relates to working with and adapting advanced AI models.
LangChain is a framework used for developing applications powered by language models, which involves modeling and orchestrating AI functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met collega's creatieve en schaalbare oplossingen bedenken
job_tasks.justification: The act of devising scalable solutions with colleagues is a software development task focused on building and deploying.

soft_skills.phrase: Samen met collega's creatieve en schaalbare oplossingen bedenken
je helpt onze klanten écht vooruit
Meewerken aan het opbouwen van onze AI-expertise binnen de organisatie.

classification.rationale: The role focuses on designing and building AI agents using GPT models and LangChain, directly aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The emphasis on integrating ML models and NLP technologies into solutions, along with building user-facing applications, further solidifies this classification.
